name: Microvolts: Recharged
storyline:
After the secret and fierce battle of the micro world, the toys were abandoned for years yet they have been waiting for someone on the dest covered in dust.
That night, fate or chance, they started working again with a new tiny spark. And the battles are about to begin again!
All they have left is a war that kills and kills each other. Because they are fully recharged!
summary: Microvolts Recharged is a quirky lobby-based third-person shooter with a unique toy theme. The game features a fun character cast and freely swappable 7 weapon types. Battle it out across dozens of large well-designed maps and frag your enemies!
